name: places/ChIJS9mm--VYwokR3mer8YytNkI
formattedAddress: 203 E 60th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 203 E 60th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: If i could give her zero stars I would, her bedside manners is atrocious. I had an appointment with her she was over and hour late with no apology. She had the nerve to rush the radiology tech, she did an entire procedure without even speaking with me before hand ( the radiology tech consented me and explained everything), no timeout was done to ensure she was performing the right procedure on the right patient/right body part. The only good thing is that she actually knows what she is doing just piss poor bedside manners and some unsafe practice regarding patient identification prior to performing a procedure. Lenox Hill Radiology need to do better.

originalText.text: My daughter had a terrible experience with this physician. Very cold and uncaring. Horrible bedside manners.
